channel.title: music on circuitshelter
channel.description: Recent content in music on circuitshelter

item.title: Amiga & Demoscene music
item.description: Amiga Music Preservation (AMP): Biggest and most comprehensive database about amiga music and amiga musicians. Mod Archive: World’s largest collections of music modules. Nectarine: Tribute to all the great computer & demoscene artists. 24/7 radio stream. SceneSat: Swedish charitable association focused on bringing the demoscene to more people than it would otherwise reach. Great radio, podcasts and lots of new tunes. BitJam: Demoscenish radio which plays a lot of C64 tracks.
item.content:
Amiga Music Preservation (AMP): Biggest and most comprehensive database about amiga music and amiga musicians.

Mod Archive: World’s largest collections of music modules.

Nectarine: Tribute to all the great computer & demoscene artists. 24/7 radio stream.

SceneSat: Swedish charitable association focused on bringing the demoscene to more people than it would otherwise reach. Great radio, podcasts and lots of new tunes.

BitJam: Demoscenish radio which plays a lot of C64 tracks.
